name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Kenze Kua)
description:
This is an online tic tac toe game I made for one of my university classes. 

It features a chat system as well although a bit buggy. And also allows spectators to watch the game. 

I made this back in late 2020 for my assignment.

Note : Unfortunately I didn't program a matchmaking system, and a room spectating system. So only 1 room can be active at a time, other players would end up joining as spectators. 

Spectators need to try to stay active, coz the server would automatically kick a user if they didn't type anything.
